argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | serf.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | serf.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | serfre.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | #P_readdcl | |- ( ( k e. RR /\ x e. RR ) -> ( k + x ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. RR /\ x e. RR ) ) -> ( k + x ) e. RR ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 5 | #P_seqf | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) : Z --> RR ) |
